ABOUT ME

I am a motivated and disciplined 21-year-old computer science student with a strong passion for software development. I combine creativity and intellect to deliver high-quality work.

Outside of coding, I enjoy exploring music production, DJing, videography, and photography, which fuel my innovative approach and attention to detail. This blend of technical skill and creative pursuit allows me to build applications that are not only functional and efficient but also engaging and well-designed.
